snippet.title: Conflict Zone (Dreamcast)
snippet.description:
Conflict Zone is a PC game developed by MASA Group and published by Ubisoft in 2001. It was simultaneously ported to the Dreamcast and Playstation 2.

Other than that the storyline (at least the ICP one) is eerily familiar today, there is nothing much to say about this. The game should have just been developed for PC, because real-time strategy games are really hard to control without a keyboard and mouse.
Sure, there is a keyboard and mouse released for the Dreamcast, but we couldn't get them to work.
The game was released to quite bad reviews and we agree.

Disclamer: This is not a complete run or a long play. We never claim to be pro gamers. We are just showing what the game looks like and how it plays, for your viewing pleasure.
We do not monetize our videos. All copyrights belong to their respective owners.
